downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 Server and Database Administration Guide
downloadDescription: This guide provides information about administering Microsoft Dynamics AX.
detailsSection:
The Server and Database Administration Guide provides information about managing Microsoft Dynamics AX components such as the Application Object Server (AOS) and the .NET Business Connector. This guide also includes information about importing and exporting data, importing and exporting code, and using the Application Integration Framework (AIF).

Note: For the most up-to-date information for Microsoft Dynamics AX administrators, see the Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 Technical Library.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
